english.segment1: I'm on Flight 92, stuck on this runway. Waiting for a storm to pass before we take. Off, I just wanna get home, Lord. I'm gettin' no signal on my cellular phone
english.segment2: I got my wife and my kids waitin' for their daddy. At the baggage claim, Lord, I miss my family. I just wanna get home, Lord. I'm gettin' no signal on my cellular phone
english.segment3: I just want to wake up, talk to the morning sun. Kiss my Mandy on the cheek, grab some breakfast and run. I love my family, Lord, bless my family. Please tell my family I'll be home soon
english.segment4: I love my kids, y'know they love their dad. And I'm with them no matter where they're at. So they know I love my family, Lord, bless my family. Please tell my family I'll be home soon
english.segment5: I'm on Flight 92, stuck on this runway. Waiting for a storm to pass before we take. Off, I just wanna get home, Lord. I'm gettin' no signal on my cellular phone
